articles.title: US regional banks' stability comes at a price after SVB's collapse - Financial Times

articles.content: Regional banks across the US have largely stopped the massive outflow of deposits that threatened their stability after the collapse of Silicon Valley Bank but their profit margins are shrinking unex… [+4617 chars]

articles.author: Elliot Smith
articles.title: UK inflation is just not going down as cost of living crisis offers 'no respite' - CNBC
articles.description: U.K. inflation remained stubbornly in double digits in March, driven largely by soaring food prices, as the country's cost-of-living crisis showed little sign of abating.
